name: planarally
tagline: A self-hosted virtual tabletop for role playing games
description: PlanarAlly is a self-hosted virtual tabletop for role-playing games (RPGs). It supports maps, fog of war, user roles, and real-time collaboration through a web interface.

features.title: Fog Of War
features.description: Reveal map areas dynamically as players explore to maintain suspense and discovery

features.title: Token Management
features.description: Place and move character tokens with drag-and-drop controls and initiative tracking

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Multiple players connect simultaneously with instant updates for all participants

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload and organize custom maps, tokens, and assets for reuse across campaigns

features.title: Vision And Lighting
features.description: Configure token vision ranges and light sources for realistic dungeon exploration
